com.fortify.client.ssc.api

Class SSCAttributeDefinitionAPI.SSCAttributeDefinitionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fortify.client.ssc.api.SSCAttributeDefinitionAPI.SSCAttributeDefinitionHelper
  • Enclosing class:
    SSCAttributeDefinitionAPI

    public final class SSCAttributeDefinitionAPI.SSCAttributeDefinitionHelper
extends Object
    This class provides various utility methods for working with SSC attribute definitions. Data is loaded from SSC only once per SSCAttributeDefinitionAPI.SSCAttributeDefinitionHelper instance. As such it is recommended to store and re-use a single instance of this class where possible. Keep in mind though that you need to get a fresh instance in order to see any attribute definition changes on SSC.
    Author:
    Ruud Senden

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JSONList getAttributeDefinitions()
      Get the list of attribute definitions, lazy loading the list if it hasn't been loaded before by this instance.
      JSONMap getAttributeDefinitionsByNameAndId()
      Get a Map containing all attribute definitions indexed by both name and id, useful for looking up attribute definitions by either name or id.
      String getAttributeIdForName(String attributeName)
      Get the attribute definition id for the given attribute name
      String getAttributeNameForId(String attributeId)
      Get the attribute name for the given attribute definition id
      org.springframework.util.MultiValueMap<String,Object> getRequiredAttributesWithDefaultValues()
      Get a MultiValueMap containing all required attribute definition id's as keys, and one or more default values for that attribute as map value.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getAttributeDefinitions

        public JSONList getAttributeDefinitions()
        Get the list of attribute definitions, lazy loading the list if it hasn't been loaded before by this instance.
        Returns:
        JSONList containing attribute definitions

      • getAttributeIdForName

        public String getAttributeIdForName(String attributeName)
        Get the attribute definition id for the given attribute name
        Parameters:
        attributeName - for which to get the id
        Returns:

      • getAttributeNameForId

        public String getAttributeNameForId(String attributeId)
        Get the attribute name for the given attribute definition id
        Parameters:
        attributeId - for which to get the name
        Returns:
        attribute name for the given attribute id

      • getAttributeDefinitionsByNameAndId

        public JSONMap getAttributeDefinitionsByNameAndId()
        Get a Map containing all attribute definitions indexed by both name and id, useful for looking up attribute definitions by either name or id.
        Returns:
        JSONMap containing both attribute names and id's as keys, and the full attribute definition as values

      • getRequiredAttributesWithDefaultValues

        public org.springframework.util.MultiValueMap<String,Object> getRequiredAttributesWithDefaultValues()
        Get a MultiValueMap containing all required attribute definition id's as keys, and one or more default values for that attribute as map value. Mainly used to automatically set default attribute values when creating new SSC application versions.
        Returns:
        MultiValueMap
